text.value: When you hang upside down, understanding comes very quickly, as quickly as falling from the 8th floor…
When you hang upside down, understanding comes very quickly as quickly as falling from the 8th floor…
After 're-education work', the client is all set to consider your offer
After 're-education work', the client is all set to consider your offer
He was trying to talk me back…Nevertheless, he’s gonna meet you halfway now!
He was trying to talk me back…Nevertheless, he’s gonna meet you halfway now!
Unfortunately, i didn’t succeed in catching her on the spot. Probably, she knew that i was gonna make a visit to her…now she is hiding from me
Unfortunately, i didn’t succeed in catching him on the spot. Probably, he knew that i was gonna make a visit to him…now he is hiding from me
I was not able to complete the mission. There were too many guards. Better luck next time…
I was not able to complete the mission. There were too many guards. Better luck next time…
Someone called the police…I was forced to go away! I should have been more careful
Someone called the police…I was forced to go away! I should have been more careful
Well, i went too far…she is in the hospital. Think, we got a problem - she is up to testify to the police!
Well, i went too far…he is in the hospital. Think, we got a problem - he is up to testify to the police!

I had no choice, I had my back to the wall…probably, this fucking secretary called the cops..Damn! It’s good that my brother works in the police. You should be prepared for unwanted visitors, just in case

I had no choice, I had my back to the wall…probably, this fucking secretary called the cops..Damn! It’s good that my brother works in the police. You should be prepared for unwanted visitors, just in case
I got carried away with clarifying a question….the neighbors suspected that something went wrong and called the police. I was forced to go away and i could leave a bunch of my fingerprints
I got carried away with clarifying a question….the neighbors suspected that something went wrong and called the police. I was forced to go away and i could leave a bunch of my fingerprints
As i expected everyone has their own secrets….I think this information will be enough to blackmail
As i expected everyone has their own secrets….I think this information will be enough to blackmail
It was soooo easy…she didn't even get that she told me everything i wanted…he-he-he
It was soooo easy…he didn't even get that he told me everything i wanted…he-he-he
At first she seemed to me unapproachable but sins exist to enjoy them, right? That’s what you wanted
At first he seemed to me unapproachable but sins exist to enjoy them, right? That’s what you wanted
Probably, she has problems with women!!! I could not even talk to her
Probably, he has problems with women!!! He is a rude, stupid fucker! I could not even talk to him
I did all my best but i didn't manage to get what you want
I did all my best but i didn't manage to get what you want
I have no good news for you…we were talking only about me…y’know, she’s a rather careful what she says
I have no good news for you…we were talking only about me…y’know, he’s a rather careful man what he says
Is my personality so well-know? I didn’t have time to start a conversation as she asked: “Who sent you?
Is my personality so well-know? I didn’t have time to start a conversation as he asked: “Who sent you?
Unfortunately, i was exposed…I think you’ll get problems
Unfortunately, i was exposed…I think you’ll get problems
Unfortunately, i was exposed…I think you’ll get problems
Unfortunately, i was exposed…I think you’ll get problems
It was not hard! My guys know their business
It was not hard! My guys know their business
I played my cards right…think this is what you want
I played my cards right…think this is what you want
That will be enough to be in deep shit!
That will be enough to be in deep shit!
I was not able to find anything useful for you. I think that’s all clean there
I was not able to find anything useful for you. I think that’s all clean there
Unfortunately, I didn't manage to dig up dirt on her. I’m gonna carry out my case next time
Unfortunately, I didn't manage to dig up dirt on him. I’m gonna carry out my case next time
The guy, who’s sent to look into that case, got lost! So i have nothing for you
The guy, who’s sent to look into that case, got lost! So i have nothing for you
I was forced to go beyond of the law in this case….unfortunately, it was in vain! Besides, i’ve got a bunch of complaints
I was forced to go beyond of the law in this case….unfortunately, it was in vain! Besides, i’ve got a bunch of complaints
He turned out to be a pretty Big Shot. Unfortunately, i was exposed…
He turned out to be a pretty Big Shot. Unfortunately, i was exposed…
She's being covered up by a prosecutor…I had to closed the case. I ain’t wanna rush things but i think there’s gonna be a counterstrike
He's being covered up by a prosecutor…I had to closed the case. I ain’t wanna rush things but i think there’s gonna be a counterstrike
It was great information! I managed to make quite a splash in that.
It was great information! I managed to make quite a splash in that.
It’ll be a success! We hit upon something interesting!
It’ll be a success! We hit upon something interesting!
It’s published on the front page of the newspaper!!! ‘The bomb’ is activated!
It’s published on the front page of the newspaper!!! ‘The bomb’ is activated!
The chief editor refused to publish my article because he didn’t find enough evidence
The chief editor refused to publish my article because he didn’t find enough evidence
There wasn’t enough information to create a stir around that
There wasn’t enough information to create a stir around that
Unfortunately, i ain’t wanna be in charge of this information. I may be in jeopardy!
Unfortunately, i ain’t wanna be in charge of this information. I may be in jeopardy!
The information was fake…now the police are about to start an investigation
The information was fake…now the police are about to start an investigation
The article was removed from publication because it’s not true…
The article was removed from publication because it’s not true…
A refutation from another journalist was published. I think you don’t need to wait for a positive result
A refutation from another journalist was published. I think you don’t need to wait for a positive result
Here’s your money! I thought i would shoot her!!! Can you imagine she was trying to hit me?!
Here’s your money! I thought i would shoot him!!! Can you imagine he was trying to hit me?!
She was about to shit his pants when she saw me! ha-ha-ha….It’s done!
He was about to shit his pants when he saw me! ha-ha-ha….It’s done!
She was about to shit his pants when she saw me! ha-ha-ha….It’s done!
He was about to shit his pants when he saw me! ha-ha-ha….It’s done!
Damn!…She managed to hide when we were chasing him. I’ll shoot in her knee next time
Son of a bitch…He managed to hide when we were chasing him. I’ll shoot in his knee next time
I have nothing to make you happy…It wasn't going to turn out the way i thought
I have nothing to make you happy…It wasn't going to turn out the way i thought
I think we got some problems….the police are on our way!
I think we got some problems….the police are on our way!
I got two news: 1. There was no money. 2. One of my guys dropped his gun there….so, there’s gonna be some questions soon…
I got two news: 1. There was no money. 2. One of my guys dropped his gun there….so, there’s gonna be some questions soon…
The information was fake! There was no money… and yeah…someone recognized me by sight! I think we should lie low…
The information was fake! There was no money… and yeah…someone recognized me by sight! I think we should lie low…
The information was fake! There was no money… and yeah…someone recognized me by sight! I think we should lie low…
The information was fake! There was no money… and yeah…someone recognized me by sight! I think we should lie low…
The job is done! No one will spot the marks at the crime scene! You can sleep in peace now.
The job is done! No one will spot the marks at the crime scene! You can sleep in peace now
It’s done, m'am! It took much more time than i expected
It’s done, sir! It took much more time than i expected
I did my bit! They say if you wanna have fewer enemies, make friends with a hitman! is it true?
I did my bit! They say if you wanna have fewer enemies, make friends with a hitman! is it true?
Unfortunately, the target is still alive - something went wrong, and I was forced to hide. I'll be glad to try again
Unfortunately, the target is still alive - something went wrong, and I was forced to hide. I'll be glad to try again
The target had good guards…i was not able to complete the order
The target had good guards…i was not able to complete the order
There was a kid…My principles do not let me kill someone in front of kids. I need more time
There was a kid…My principles do not let me kill someone in front of kids. I need more time
I think someone found out about the coming murder…the victim was not there
I think someone found out about the coming murder…the victim was not there
There was turmoil …i was forced to leave my spot….one of the bystanders saw my face very well…the may be troubles now
There was turmoil …i was forced to leave my spot….one of the bystanders saw my face very well…the may be troubles now
The police cordoned off the building where i was….it’s good there is a basement there through which i managed to hide….i'm afraid that i could leave marks there
The police cordoned off the building where i was….it’s good there is a basement there through which i managed to hide….i'm afraid that i could leave marks there
Kidnapping: +100% to chance
No negative effects
Daylight robbery: 3% of cash
No effects
Armed robbery: 10% of cash
No effects
Planned robbery: 10% of cash
No effects
Beat: +70% to chance
No negative effects
Seduce: +75% to loyalty
No effects
Rout: +50% to loyalty
No effects
Flirtation: +25% to loyalty
No effects
No effects
No effects
No effects
Slander: -50% target's reputation
No effects
Publish dirt: -75% target's reputation
No effects
Write article: -25% target's reputation
No effects
No effects
No effects
No effects
Threat: +20% to chance
No negative effects

The creepy and slippery cowboy with a rich criminal background. Since childhood he has known only one law - ‘Rule of the gun’! Due to the rapid growth of capitalism, the incoherent legal systems required only three things from him: intelligence, determination and shooting ability. Having declared himself an outlaw, theft and robbery became his means for making money. If you need his services, be ready to pay him well.
In case of success, the agent will steal up to 10% of the cash
%1 is robbed. You got $%2

Poly Adler is a mystery woman and a true seductress of men. Early in life, she realized that a rich and influential lover is a ticket to a happy life! Since then, she has lurked in the circles of high society, attempting to gather useful information on men. She listens in on private conversations that may contain dirt on married male characters.
In case of success, the agent will helps you manipulate a character (only men) by decreasing the required influence to meet with him. Also, the success is up to your influence on that character.
%1 is hooked. Required influence to unlock is decreased

The brilliant detective, who knows the criminal world perfectly, is being a head of the investigation office that made up of former criminals. He's able to solve any puzzles affiliated with the dark past of a character as well as with financial fraud in a company. By having the opportunity to act beyond the law, he provides some guarantee for clients.
In case of success, you will be getting +100% permanently to the chance to make deals with a compromised character
%1 is compromised. +100% chance to deal

Harry is the author of many scandalous articles, works in “The New York Herald». He always conducts an aggressive investigation by exposing different financial fraud in a company. If there is the opportunity to dish the dirt on a famous politician or official, Harry is ready. If you need to remove someone from their position or you need to cut out a competitor, Harry Copper will be glad to help you!
In case of success, a target's reputation will be ruined by 50% - 100%
%1's reputation is ruined by %2

That’s rather hard to imagine a political or criminal life without this person. According to the latest data, known as Walter Hill. No one has ever managed to catch him off-guard! He has managed to achieve the greater heights in the criminal world due to ‘clean job’ eliminating both an entrepreneur and representatives of the political elite. Walter is one of the most dangerous characters because he is able to start hunting for you, and if he succeeds in achieving the goal, the game will be over!
In case of success, a target will be eliminated
%1 is killed

This big guy has huge muscles and a harsh look making you think very well before you say “NO”. All this gives him a great ability to see eye to eye with stubborn characters because the last thing he always hears is: “I believe we’ll be able to deal”. He is capable of sorting out your problem if you pay him very well, thereby increasing the chance to make a deal.
In case of success, you will get an extra bonus (once) to the chance to make a deal
%1 is intimidated. The deal chance is up!
